name: S2019 Group 13 - Snowed in Survival
description: You play as RJ, trapped inside a snowed in cabin during the peak of winter. Without an easy escape, you must use calculated choices within your environment to stay alive for three days. Click on objects to utilize them, and keep track of your stats in order to stave off death. Not only are their physical stats, but emotional and mental ones as well. Choose wisely as you navigate the cabin and outside grounds to survive as long as you can.
